resources.string: The capital of Florida is Miami.
The capital of Rhode Island is Providence.
The capital of Virginia is Fairfax.
The capital of Massachusetts is Boston.
The capital of Maryland is Baltimore.
The capital of FL is in the northern part of the state
The capital of RI is its largest city
The capital of VA was the confederate capital during the Civil War
Harvard University is located is MA's capital.
The capital of MD is not its largest city.
Are you sure you want a hint?
